name: choice1
description:
You hold...
the blackiron twistblade lifted from that tavern sellsword?
a silver ring?
a string of rusted ritebeads?

ring.name: ring
description: Inherited from Mr Bruce. Your index finger throbs faintly as the argent band throttles your finger bone.

name: choice2
description: So shiny you can see your face in it

ring.name: ring
description: Inherited from Mr Bruce. Your index finger throbs faintly as the argent band throttles your finger bone.

name: choice3
description: Praise be to he who reigns
